title: is there a way to save entire game replays as video files?

replies.body: You should be able to save that entire replay by recording and letting the replay play all the way through. Be careful not to move the progress bar while recording, as that can sometimes cause some really terrible screeching to be recorded as well.
could you suggest the client team to possibly consider adding a "save entire match" button in the replay interface. if its not too much trouble
